title: Apple stops signing iOS 15.4 following iOS 15.4.1 release with battery life fixes
content:
Just a week after the release of iOS 15.4.1, Apple has stopped signing iOS 15.4 This means that iPhone users can no longer downgrade from iOS 15.4.1 to iOS 15.4, while it oftentimes also has an impact on users who jailbreak.

more…

The post Apple stops signing iOS 15.4 following iOS 15.4.1 release with battery life fixes appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Just a week after the release of iOS 15.4.1, Apple has stopped signing iOS 15.4 This means that iPhone users can no longer downgrade from iOS 15.4.1 to iOS 15.4, while it oftentimes also has an impact on users who jailbreak. iOS 15.4.1 came after the feature-packed release of iOS 15.4, which added support for […]
